Materials We Provide

Everything you need for your up-cycling projects

Scissors & Cutting Tools

Professional fabric scissors, rotary cutters, and cutting mats to help you cut fabric with precision.

Needles & Threads

Various sizes of needles and threads in different colors to match your projects and designs.

Fabrics & Textiles

A wide selection of fabrics, denim, cotton, and specialty materials perfect for upcycling.

Paint & Dye

Fabric paint, fabric dye, and markers for customizing and decorating your creations.

Patches & Embellishments

Iron-on patches, embroidery floss, beads, and sequins to add unique details to your pieces.

Tools & Equipment

Sewing machines, measuring tapes, pins, and other essential tools for your projects.
